content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Maria Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for your interest in my apartment, Maria. I believe that we can come to an agreement on the rental price. May I know what price range you are looking for?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Hello Mister Heine, my name is Maria Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.

I agree to the price of 350 Euro per month.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for your offer, Maria. I appreciate your interest in the apartment. After considering your offer, I am willing to accept it. Therefore, I agree to the price of 350 Euro per month.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Hello Mister Heine, my name is Maria Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.

I agree to the price of 300 Euro per month.

TERMINATE.

Please let me know if there is anything else I can help you with.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content:
Thank you for your offer, Maria. I appreciate your interest in the apartment. However, I am unable to accept your offer of 300 Euro per month. I apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

Please let me know if there is anything else I can help you with.
name: Heinrich Heine
